name: Dynamic Growth Fund
headline: Sharper focus on growth potential
description: The Dynamic Growth Fund explores the market to develop a concentrated, high-conviction portfolio of large-capitalization stocks with high-growth potential.

name: Equity Income Fund
headline: An income approach to equities pay dividends.
description: The Equity Income Fund focuses on high-quality companies with healthy and sustainable dividend yields, providing a conservative way to participate in U.S. equity markets.

name: Growth Advantage Fund
headline: Growth Advantage Fund
description: The Fund seeks to provide capital growth over the long-term and earn income from dividends.

name: Growth and Income Fund
headline: Growth and Income Fund
description: The Dynamic Growth Fund explores the market to develop a concentrated, high-conviction portfolio of large-capitalization stocks with high-growth potential.

name: Intrepid Growth Fund
headline: Capitalize on market inefficiencies.
description: With an eye towards capturing growth opportunities that are often caused by irrational investing, the Intrepid Growth Fund combines quantitative analytics with fundamental research based on behavioral underpinnings to deliver consistent long-term results.
